import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{connect}from"react-redux";{/*
    This class displays success message to user.
    Then allows to display it in the previous permissions
    screen thanks the button that created below.

*/}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{userStatus:state.userLoginReducer.userStatus};};function displaySuccessMessageWhenPermissionDemanded(props){var currLink="";if(props.userStatus===1){currLink="PersonelNavigation";}else if(props.userStatus===2){currLink="NavigateTheChief";}console.log(props.userStatus,"USERIN STATUSU");return/*#__PURE__*/ (/* Here the main <div> */React.createElement("div",{style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",textAlign:"center",flex:4}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",fontFamily:"Scada",fontSize:"35px",borderBottom:"1px solid black",margin:"auto",color:"rgb(5,73,5)",flex:3,marginTop:"15px"}},"\u0130Z\u0130N TALEB\u0130N\u0130Z BA\u015EARIYLA YARATILMI\u015ETIR"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:currLink,style:{textDecoration:"none",display:"flex",flex:1,margin:"20px"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-outline-success",style:{display:"flex",flex:1}},"ANA EKRANA D\xD6N"))));}export default connect(mapStateToProps)(displaySuccessMessageWhenPermissionDemanded);
